mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, created_at, deleted_at, is_blinded, diary_record_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM reply ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, title, content, created_at, deleted_at, is_blinded, diary_record_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM reply WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT reply.id, title, content, created_at, deleted_at, is_blinded, reply.diary_record_id, reply.sender_id, reply.receiver_id, diary_record.diary_id FROM reply JOIN diary_record ON reply.diary_record_id = diary_record.id WHERE diary_record.diary_id = #{diaryId} ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, title, content, created_at, deleted_at, is_blinded, diary_record_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM reply WHERE sender_id = #{senderId} ORDER BY created_at DESC;
